# iosxr_cef (Resource)

This resource can manage the CEF configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_cef" "example" {
  adjacency_route_override_rib                                     = true
  platform_lsm_frr_holdtime                                        = 60
  retry_service_time                                               = 50
  retry_timeout                                                    = 15
  retry_syslog_timer                                               = 120
  encap_sharing_disable                                            = true
  consistent_hashing_auto_recovery                                 = true
  proactive_arp_nd_enable                                          = true
  ltrace_multiplier                                                = 8
  load_balancing_mode_hierarchical_ecmp_min_paths                  = 16
  load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_and_dlb              = true
  load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_resource_threshold   = 80
  load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dlb_resource_threshold         = 90
  load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_and_dlb_max_duration = 200
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `adjacency_route_override_rib` (Boolean) Set options for adjacency routes overriding RIB routes
- `consistent_hashing_auto_recovery` (Boolean) Automatically recover to previous hash state
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `encap_sharing_disable` (Boolean) Use this in conjunction with BGP per-prefix label mode
- `load_balancing_mode_hierarchical_ecmp_min_paths` (Number) Minimum paths for qualifying HLB. Paths exceeding the configured value will be installed in HLB mode
  - Range: `1`-`128`
- `load_balancing_mode_hierarchical_ucmp_group_size` (Number) UCMP group size for HLB
  - Range: `1`-`128`
- `load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_and_dlb` (Boolean) OOR handling configuration
- `load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_and_dlb_max_duration` (Number) max-duration time configuration
  - Range: `1`-`600`
- `load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dampening_resource_threshold` (Number) percentage threshold parameter
  - Range: `1`-`99`
- `load_balancing_recursive_oor_mode_dlb_resource_threshold` (Number) percentage threshold parameter
  - Range: `1`-`99`
- `ltrace_multiplier` (Number) ltrace multiplier
  - Range: `1`-`16`
- `platform_lsm_frr_holdtime` (Number) Time to keep FRR slots programmed post FRR
  - Range: `3`-`180`
- `proactive_arp_nd_enable` (Boolean) Enable proactive ARP/ND feature
- `retry_service_time` (Number) Retry service time (default 50 msec)
  - Range: `1`-`15000`
- `retry_syslog_timer` (Number) Syslog timer in seconds(default 120 seconds), 0 to disable
  - Range: `0`-`86400`
- `retry_timeout` (Number) Retry timeout (default 15 msec)
  - Range: `1`-`30000`

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_cef.example ""
```
